name: Toiyabe Golf Club
description: Toiyabe Golf Club is a semi-private golf club nestled in the foothills of the Toiyabe National Forest and the Sierra Nevada Mountains in Washoe Valley, Nevada. The club’s signature 18-hole Robert Muir Graves-designed course is a natural blend of links-style and Alpine golf that will challenge low handicap players, as well as golfers of all abilities. Toiyabe Golf Club is open year-round and features a restaurant with indoor and outdoor dining, wedding and corporate meeting space, and special events throughout the year.

faqs.question: What’s included in Toiyabe golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, pre-booked tee times at Toiyabe, carts, and concierge planning. Transportation and dining add-ons available.

faqs.question: How much do Toiyabe packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $199–$499 per golfer depending on season, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—tee time blocks, room blocks, tournament setup, and full concierge planning for buddies and corporate groups.

tips.title: A classic design nestled halfway between Reno and Carson City.
tips.content:
Toiyabe Golf Club is a semi-private golf club nestled in the foothills of the Toiyabe National Forest and the Sierra Nevada Mountains in Washoe Valley, Nevada. The club’s signature 18-hole Robert Muir Graves-designed course is a natural blend of links-style and Alpine golf that will challenge low handicap players, as well as golfers of all abilities. Toiyabe Golf Club is open year-round and features a restaurant with indoor and outdoor dining, wedding and corporate meeting space, and special events throughout the year.

tips.title: Golf The High Sierra
tips.content: Book your next group golf trip with us!

pointOfView: This Robert Muir Graves design is old school good. Set at the base of the mountains, directly below Lake Tahoe, you'll get diversity on every hole. The entire course is surrounded by some of the most beautiful homes in the region, it's picturesque from every angle. The front 9 has plenty of water and distance to challenge every golfer, and the back nine incorporates some challenging elevation change and has several holes up in the pines. Originally built as a private country club, the facility spared no expense in providing comfort, and the restaurant is renown across the region as having a great menu. The course is located half way between Reno and Carson City, and with the new Freeway exchange, you can make it there in 20 minutes from South Reno.
contentParagraphs: Play Toiyabe Golf Club near Reno with group golf trips, tee times, and stay and play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure golf getaways.
Serving breakfast and lunch in an amazing setting overlooking the 18th hole at Toiyabe Golf Club and views of Slide Mountian. We offer a full bar and an traditional menu.

featuredHole.title: Hole #13 — Par 4
featuredHole.description: A stunning uphill par 4 carved through the pines on the back nine. The approach plays a full club longer than the yardage suggests. The view of Slide Mountain from the green makes the climb worth it.

testimonials.quote: First time playing Toiyabe Golf Club and it exceeded every expectation. The scenery alone is worth the trip, but the course layout is genuinely challenging and fair. Our whole group wants to come back.
testimonials.author: Tina K.

testimonials.quote: Played Toiyabe Golf Club with our group and it was incredible. The Robert Muir Graves design keeps you thinking on every shot. Easily one of the best courses in Reno, NV.
testimonials.author: Scott A.

testimonials.quote: Our annual group plays Toiyabe Golf Club every year through GTHS. The course never disappoints — it's always in tournament condition. The Reno, NV scenery makes it feel like a bucket-list round every time.
testimonials.author: Bill H.
